page.title: 15WINFORD CEVC CONT.
page.content: Every week we have{Activities Hour. Mums come in to help us. We do { {basketweaving, weaving, clay, games, {painting, computer, food activities, } {sewing, fabric work and we also {produce slide tape shows. Every year we have an{Activities Week. Mums come in to help us. This year we had our{sports day with fresh cream {teas,}then we had our{Area Sports. We went to{Cleeve Activities Centre at {Goblin Combe}and we went{Ice-Skating} and took a{boat trip down the River {Avon.}We had a{Problem Solving Day and{BAR-B-Q}and went to the{Avon {Wildlife Trust Fair. } Every year class 3 go on a{School {Journey.}This year we went to{Barry {Island. We have a good{Football Team}and we have won the{Ray Mabbutt Trophy}two years running.
